Actions.Name: Autocomplete
Actions.Description: Provide autocomplete suggestions for businesses, search keywords and categories.

Actions.Name: Get Business Details
Actions.Description: Get rich business data, such as name, address, phone number, photos, Yelp rating, price levels and hours of operation.

Actions.Name: Find Business Match
Actions.Description: Find the Yelp business that matches an exact input location. Use this action to match business data from other sources with Yelp businesses.

Actions.Name: Search Businesses
Actions.Description: Search for businesses by Term (keyword), category, location, price level, etc. Use this action when you have general info on the biz like name & location but don't know the address.

Actions.Name: Search Business Phones
Actions.Description: Returns a list of businesses based on the provided phone number. Use this action when you only have the phone number or less confident about other matching criteria.

Actions.Name: Get Reviews
Actions.Description: Get up to three review excerpts for a business.
